theAlchemist:Overheal.NAME: Overheal
theAlchemist:Overheal.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you heal for more than your max HP, gain the difference in Regeneration

theAlchemist:LeadToGold.NAME: Lead to Gold
theAlchemist:LeadToGold.Description: Remove target's block, gain gold equal to the amount of block removed times !M!

theAlchemist:PotionJunky.NAME: Potion Junky
theAlchemist:PotionJunky.DESCRIPTION: Deal Damage equivalent to the amount of buffs you currently have.
theAlchemist:PotionJunky.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: NL Increase all buffs by 1 stage.

theAlchemist:Violation.NAME: Violation
theAlchemist:Violation.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card from you exhaust pile. Deal 4 damage to self.
theAlchemist:Violation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards from you exhaust pile. Deal 4 damage to self.
